name: SoulTea
description: SoulTea is a storygame about an small kobold that explores the World of the lost souls. Meeting the two demon brothers, he sees that this realm bounds everyone to itself if they enter without drinking an tea thats brewn out of local herbs. If you crack your clay teacup and loose your tea, you loose your soul and transform into an everhungry shadow lizard that eats moss and crystals, longing for another soul to join them. The golden dragon sleeping in the cavern above the land builds a new floating way above their heads, leading to a mysterious golden egg.
